headline: Compared to Estimates, Applied Materials (AMAT) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Applied Materials (AMAT) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended July 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: China Will Be A Core Strength for Applied Materials, Says Muse
summary: CJ Muse, Cantor Fitzgerald Semiconductor and Semiconductor Equipment Equity Research Analyst, joins Open Interest to discuss expectations for Applied Materials, Sandisk, and other chips-related stocks.

headline: Applied Materials Earnings Are Today. Analyst Expects Good Guidance.
summary: Analysts expect the world’s largest chip-equipment maker to report July quarter revenue of $7.22 billion and adjusted earnings of $2.36 a share.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Applied Materials Stock Ahead Of Q3 Earnings
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) will release earnings results for the third quarter after the closing bell on Thursday, Aug. 14. Analysts expect the tech company to report quarterly earnings at $2.36 per share, up from $2.12 per share in the year-ago period. Applied Materials—a supplier of chipmaking equipment to Texas Instruments’ U.S. factories— projects to report quarterly revenue at $7.22 billion, compared to $6.78 billion a year earlier, according to data from Benzinga Pro. headline: Stocks Muted Before the Open With Key U.S. PPI Data in Focus
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are down -0.02%, and September Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQU25) are down -0.08% this morning, taking a breather after recent gains, while investors look ahead to crucial U.S. producer inflation data for insight into how aggressively the Federal Reserve may cut interest rates.

headline: Consumer Sentiment, Retail Sales, Deere Earnings: Still to Come This Week
summary: The rest of this week brings more economic data, including a report on wholesale inflation on Thursday and retail-sales figures on Friday. Also up ahead are earnings from companies including Deere, JD.
